data.title: Location of Pilgrim Office for Compostela
data.meta_description: A map to reach compostella office (next door of post office) from Cathedral Square.
data.text:
Time of past OR future Camino

Portugal

Apr 17, 2022

#1

A map to reach compostella office (next door of post office) from Cathedral Square.

Attachments

Screenshot_20220417-072519_Maps.jpg

lt56ny

Veteran Member

Time of past OR future Camino

2024 Aragones, Madrid, Portugues Coastal

Apr 17, 2022

#2

It is so easy. Walk downhill on the street in front of the Parador. The Parador will be on your right. Make a right at the first street. The Church of San Fructuosa will be in front of you on the left across the street. (Check it out if you can). Keep walking straight, pass the post office on the left and there is the Pilgrim Office a little further down on the left. There are always some security people and pilgrims out in front. Impossible to miss.

Time of past OR future Camino

Portugal

Apr 17, 2022

#3

It is so easy. Walk downhill on the street in front of the Parador. The Parador will be on your right. Make a right at the first street. The Church of San Fructuosa will be in front of you on the left across the street. (Check it out if you can). Keep walking straight, pass the post office on the left and there is the Pilgrim Office a little further down on the left. There are always some security people and pilgrims out in front. Impossible to miss.

I found it difficult to find the office from a non English speaking Spaniard. A map will be useful for the first timer.

trecile

Moderator

I found it difficult to find the office from a non English speaking Spaniard. A map will be useful for the first timer.

Whatever works It’s good some people are visual some people are auditory and as long as we can get them to the program office for the Compostela it’s all good. Take care
